sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_02826537070101101590f19d7c1ed0c0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ViaCepIntegration</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>RESTMessageV2API: https://developer.servicenow.com/dev.do#!/reference/api/rome/server/c_RESTMessageV2API
ViaCep API: https://viacep.com.br/</description><name>ViaCepIntegration</name><script><![CDATA[var ViaCepIntegration = Class.create();
ViaCepIntegration.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getRua: function() {
        try {
            var baseUrl = 'https://viacep.com.br/ws/';
            var cep = this.getParameter('sysparm_cep');
            var response, httpResponseStatus, body;

            var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            request.setHttpMethod('get');
            request.setEndpoint(baseUrl + cep + '/json');
            response = request.execute();

            httpResponseStatus = response.getStatusCode();
            body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());

            if (httpResponseStatus == 200) {
                gs.info('Execution global.ViaCepIntegration:\nStatus: ' + httpResponseStatus + '\nBody: ' + body.logradouro);
                return body.logradouro;
            }

        } catch (e) {
            var error = e.getMessage();
            gs.info('Error try catch: ' + error);
        }
    },

    getBairro: function() {
        try {
            var baseUrl = 'https://viacep.com.br/ws/';
            var cep = this.getParameter('sysparm_cep');
            var response, httpResponseStatus, body;

            var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            request.setHttpMethod('get');
            request.setEndpoint(baseUrl + cep + '/json');
            response = request.execute();

            httpResponseStatus = response.getStatusCode();
            body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());

            if (httpResponseStatus == 200) {
                gs.info('Execution global.ViaCepIntegration:\nStatus: ' + httpResponseStatus + '\nBody: ' + body.bairro);
                return body.bairro;
            }

        } catch (e) {
            var error = e.getMessage();
            gs.info('Error try catch: ' + error);
        }
    },

    getCidade: function() {
        try {
            var baseUrl = 'https://viacep.com.br/ws/';
            var cep = this.getParameter('sysparm_cep');
            var response, httpResponseStatus, body;

            var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            request.setHttpMethod('get');
            request.setEndpoint(baseUrl + cep + '/json');
            response = request.execute();

            httpResponseStatus = response.getStatusCode();
            body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());

            if (httpResponseStatus == 200) {
                gs.info('Execution global.ViaCepIntegration:\nStatus: ' + httpResponseStatus + '\nBody: ' + body.localidade);
                return body.localidade;
            }

        } catch (e) {
            var error = e.getMessage();
            gs.info('Error try catch: ' + error);
        }
    },

    getEstado: function() {
        try {
            var baseUrl = 'https://viacep.com.br/ws/';
            var cep = this.getParameter('sysparm_cep');
            var response, httpResponseStatus, body;

            var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            request.setHttpMethod('get');
            request.setEndpoint(baseUrl + cep + '/json');
            response = request.execute();

            httpResponseStatus = response.getStatusCode();
            body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());

            if (httpResponseStatus == 200) {
                gs.info('Execution global.ViaCepIntegration:\nStatus: ' + httpResponseStatus + '\nBody: ' + body.uf);
                return body.uf;
            }

        } catch (e) {
            var error = e.getMessage();
            gs.info('Error try catch: ' + error);
        }
    },

    type: 'ViaCepIntegration'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vimartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-21 12:01:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>02826537070101101590f19d7c1ed0c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ViaCepIntegration</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_02826537070101101590f19d7c1ed0c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vimartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-21 16:48:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_7439a137070101101590f19d7c1ed08f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:3959476707c101101590f19d7c1ed0ab</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>VC: Preenchimento campos de endereço</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    /* Preencimento do logradouro */

    var gaRua = new GlideAjax('ViaCepIntegration');
    gaRua.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRua');
    gaRua.addParam('sysparm_cep', newValue);
    gaRua.getXML(callbackRua);

    function callbackRua(response) {
        var rua = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
        if (rua) {
            g_form.setValue('logradouro', rua);
            g_form.showFieldMsg('cep', 'O CEP é válido.', 'info');
        } else {
            g_form.clearValue('cep');
            g_form.showFieldMsg('cep', 'O CEP é inválido.', 'error');
        }
    }

    /* Preencimento do bairro */

    var gaBairro = new GlideAjax('ViaCepIntegration');
    gaBairro.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getBairro');
    gaBairro.addParam('sysparm_cep', newValue);
    gaBairro.getXML(callbackBairro);

    function callbackBairro(response) {
        var bairro = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
        g_form.setValue('bairro', bairro);

    }

    /* Preencimento da cidade */

    var gaCidade = new GlideAjax('ViaCepIntegration');
    gaCidade.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCidade');
    gaCidade.addParam('sysparm_cep', newValue);
    gaCidade.getXML(callbackCidade);

    function callbackCidade(response) {
        var cidade = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
        g_form.setValue('cidade', cidade);
    }

    /* Preencimento do estado */

    var gaEstado = new GlideAjax('ViaCepIntegration');
    gaEstado.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getEstado');
    gaEstado.addParam('sysparm_cep', newValue);
    gaEstado.getXML(callbackEstado);

    function callbackEstado(response) {
        var estado = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
        g_form.setValue('estado', estado);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vimartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-21 12:08:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7439a137070101101590f19d7c1ed08f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VC: Preenchimento campos de endereço</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7439a137070101101590f19d7c1ed08f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vimartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-22 02:32:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="VC: Endereço">fac7c32707c101101590f19d7c1ed0a9</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

AC, AM, RR, PA, RO, AP, TO

Região Centro-Oeste:
MT, MS, GO, DF

Região Nordeste:
MA, PI, BA, SE, AL, PE, PB, RN, CE

Região Sudeste:
MG, ES, RJ, SP

Região Sul:
PR, SC, RS</description><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>VC: Preenchimento grupo de suporte</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        g_form.clearValue('grupo_de_suporte');
        return;
    }

    switch (newValue) {
        case 'TO':
            g_form.setValue('grupo_de_suporte', '1fac144c071901101590f19d7c1ed0d6');
            break;
        case 'DF':
            g_form.setValue('grupo_de_suporte', '190d180c071901101590f19d7c1ed0a1');
            break;
        case 'BA':
            g_form.setValue('grupo_de_suporte', '7b3d580c071901101590f19d7c1ed047');
            break;
        case 'RJ':
            g_form.setValue('grupo_de_suporte', 'd97d9c4c071901101590f19d7c1ed069');
            break;
        case 'SC':
            g_form.setValue('grupo_de_suporte', 'daadd84c071901101590f19d7c1ed017');
            break;
        default:
            g_form.setValue('grupo_de_suporte', '1f506000075901101590f19d7c1ed0cb');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vimartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-22 01:24:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5b9bdcc8071901101590f19d7c1ed0e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VC: Preenchimento grupo de suporte</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5b9bdcc8071901101590f19d7c1ed0e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vimartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-22 01:48:50</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
restrictedtrueon_desktopfalse109f0438c6112276003ae8ac13e7009d01970-01-03 00:00:00Objetivo: formulário capaz de preencher automaticamente o telefone do solicitante resgatando o "phone" ou "mobile_phone" na tabela de usuários (sys_user). 
Além disso o formulário terá uma integração com a ViaCEP API (https://viacep.com.br/) para preencher automaticamente os campos do endereço com base no CEP. 
O fluxo do formulário consistirá em encaminhar o chamado para o grupo de suporte contido no campo "Grupo de suporte". 
A lógica de preenchimento desse campo foi feita em um client script com switch case.
 
Sobre o fluxo, a RITM é aberta para o grupo de suporte específico e atualiza automaticamente o install_status do
ativo selecionado para "Em manutenção", após a data agendada, atualiza o status para "Em estoque".

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
    }
    if (!Number(newValue)) {
		g_form.clearValue('cep');
		g_form.showFieldMsg('cep', 'Por favor, insira apenas números no campo CEP.', 'error');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vimartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-21 00:50:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>119e83ab07c101101590f19d7c1ed068</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VC: Somente números "CEP"</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_119e83ab07c101101590f19d7c1ed068</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vimartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-21 00:53:30</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="VC: Endereço">fac7c32707c101101590f19d7c1ed0a9</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ee51926b070101101590f19d7c1ed06c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UserUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>GlideRecord: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/rome-application-development/page/script/server-scripting/concept/c_UsingGlideRecordToQueryTables.html</description><name>UserUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var UserUtils = Class.create();
// UserUtils.prototype = {
UserUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    //     initialize: function() {},

    getPhone: function() {
        var phone, mobilePhone, response;
        var userSysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_user'); //É necessário declarar o parâmetro com mesmo nome que foi declarado no GlideAjax;
        var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        grUser.addQuery('sys_id', userSysId);
        grUser.setLimit(1);
        grUser.query();
        if (grUser.next()) {
            phone = grUser.getValue('phone');
            mobilePhone = grUser.getValue('mobile_phone');
            phone ? response = phone : response = mobilePhone;
        }
        return response;
    },

    //     type: 'UserUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vimartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-20 20:21:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>ee51926b070101101590f19d7c1ed06c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ee51926b070101101590f19d7c1ed06c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vimartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-20 23:42:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ac64562f070101101590f19d7c1ed0e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:513f862b070101101590f19d7c1ed03c</cat_variable><condition/><description>GlideAjax: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/rome-application-development/page/script/ajax/topic/p_AJAX.html</description><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>VC: Preencher telefone do solicitante</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (newValue == '') {
		g_form.clearValue('telefone');
        return;
    }

    var ga = new GlideAjax('UserUtils');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPhone'); //declarar o nome do método como parâmetro "sysparm_name" (parâmetro com nome fixo)
    ga.addParam('sysparm_user', newValue); //declarar o valor que será enviado no parâmetro chamado no método "getPhone"
    ga.getXML(callback);

    function callback(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
        answer ? g_form.setValue('telefone', answer) : g_form.setValue('telefone', 'Telefone não cadastrado na base. Insira.');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>vimartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-20 20:45:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ac64562f070101101590f19d7c1ed0e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VC: Preencher telefone do solicitante</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ac64562f070101101590f19d7c1ed0e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>vimartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-22 03:11:56</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="VC: Informações do solicitante">240e4623070101101590f19d7c1ed0ab</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
